
FUNCTION CreateSlide2 GLOBAL
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({M})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({V})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
    # move image to the right
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonDown MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 711 Y: 442 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonUp MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 880 Y: 442 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.AnimateFast
    # Resize picture
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonDown MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 725 Y: 210 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.AnimateFast
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonUp MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 844 Y: 334 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.AnimateFast
    # move image up
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonDown MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1024 Y: 493 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.AnimateFast
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendMouseClick.ClickAt ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.MouseClickType.LeftButtonUp MillisecondsDelay: 0 X: 1024 Y: 445 RelativeTo: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionRelativeTo.Screen MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.AnimateFast
    # click the title of the slide and save
    MouseAndKeyboard.MoveMouseToImage.ClickImage Images: [imgrepo['SlideTitle']] SearchForImageOn: MouseAndKeyboard.SearchTarget.EntireScreen MousePositionOnImage: MouseAndKeyboard.PositionOnImage.MiddleCenter OffsetX: 0 OffsetY: 0 Tolerance: 10 MovementStyle: MouseAndKeyboard.MovementStyle.Instant Occurence: 1 Timeout: 5 ClickType: MouseAndKeyboard.ClickType.LeftClick SecondsBeforeClick: 0 SearchAlgorithm: MouseAndKeyboard.ImageFinderAlgorithm.Legacy
    MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''System Information''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END FUNCTION
